subsection_content:
Ketoacidosis is the accumulation of acid in a patient's blood. Occurs when blood sugar levels are too high and last for too long. The disease is common in people with type 1 diabetes and less common in people with type 2 diabetes. (1)
Ketoacidosis is a serious complication that can be life-threatening. Patients can treat and prevent ketoacidosis if they control their blood sugar well.
subsection_title: nhiem toan ceton.json. What is ketoacidosis?

nhiem toan ceton.json. What is ketoacidosis?
Ketoacidosis is the accumulation of acid in a patient's blood. Occurs when blood sugar levels are too high and last for too long. The disease is common in people with type 1 diabetes and less common in people with type 2 diabetes. (1)
Ketoacidosis is a serious complication that can be life-threatening. Patients can treat and prevent ketoacidosis if they control their blood sugar well.
